title: 2 Br Townhouse w/Fireplace | $500 Off 1st Month's Rent
posting_body: ['Loring Park Apartments', 'Beautiful apartment!', "$500 Off 1st month's rent with a 10, 11 or 12 month lease.", '2 bedroom / 1.5 bath two-story townhouse in the city!', 'This end unit has a gas fireplace, hardwood flooring in living room, dining room and kitchen.', 'Full-size stainless appliances and granite counter tops.', 'Schedule a tour today!', 'Visit <URL> Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Please call', 'show contact info', 'to speak with our Leasing Office.', 'Rental Information', 'Apply Online!', '30-minute easy process', '$400 Security deposit', '$50 Application fee per adult', '$200 Administrative fee per unit', '3 to 12-month lease terms', 'Utilities', 'HVAC with heat and central AC', 'Center Point Energy gas', 'Xcel Energy electric', 'Co-axial & ethernet cable ready', 'Residents pay all utilities', 'Avg studio: $125', 'Avg 1 bed: $175', 'Avg 2 bed: $225', 'Pets', 'Cats & Dogs Welcome!', 'Pet-friendly building*!', '$300 Non-refundable pet fee', '$50 monthly pet rent', '*Some breed restrictions for dogs apply', 'Apartments', 'Great views', 'In-unit laundry', 'Hard wood floors', 'Carpeted bedrooms', 'Deep soaking bathtubs', 'Full-size GE & Whirlpool electric appliances:', 'Refrigerator', 'Flat top stove with oven', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Garbage disposal', 'Icemaker', 'Building', 'Built in 2002', 'Modern lobby', '3 elevators', 'Enclosed, heated garage with assigned spaces', 'Butterfly MX easy access by phone', '24-hour package room', 'Large balconies*', 'Bay window*', 'Lofted units (top floor)', '*some units', 'Convenience', '1 block to Loring Park', 'Lunds grocery and liquor store across the street', 'Quick 10-minute drive to Whole Foods, Trader Joe’s, Kowalski’s and Cub Foods', 'Easy 4 block walk to Target store', 'Target Field and US Bank Stadium within walking distance', 'Minutes to Uptown and the lakes', 'Green neighborhood great for walking and biking', 'Walker Art Center', 'Orchestra Hall']
